description: This file provides REST API endpoints for multilingual support, including listing supported languages and updating user or organization preferred languages within a FastAPI web application.

methods.name: list_languages()
methods.description: Returns a list of supported languages.

methods.name: update_user_language( lang: LanguageUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Updates the preferred language for the current user.

methods.name: update_org_language( org_id: int, lang: LanguageUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
methods.description: Updates the preferred language for an organization, accessible to authorized roles.

ctags.name: update_org_language
ctags.signature: ( org_id: int, lang: LanguageUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )

ctags.name: update_user_language
ctags.signature: ( lang: LanguageUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
